metadata.title: CVE-2023-6918 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in the libssh implements abstract layer for message digest(MD) operations implemented by different supported crypto backends. Thereturn values from these were not properly checked, which could causelow-memory situations failures, NULL dereferences, crashes, or usage of theuninitialized memory as an input for the KDF. In this case, non-matchingkeys will result in decryption/integrity failures, terminating theconnection.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6918` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libssh-4 - 0.10.5-3ubuntu1.2
libssh-gcrypt-4 - 0.10.5-3ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libssh package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.10.5-3ubuntu1.2').
